TEXT: Keepin' the Spire stocked wit potions ain't no walk in da park, ya know? NL I gotta bust my hump collectin' ingredients an' brewin' potions over here.
NL You dig out your best potions.

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~fat~ ~one,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~
